KnowledgeBase.Title: Example NumVector compareLE 014
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compare compareEQ compareNE compareGE compareLT compareGT

Example.Description: These examples use the compareLE function to compare two Vectors and return the Boolean value, true or false. The corresponding values of each Vector are compared to determine whether one Vector is lesser than or equal to the other.

Syntax.Note: The Vectors are equal since their values are equal.
